actions.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 3 (Roll no. 500).

description: Amendment increases funding for the Rural Utilities Service Rural Water and Waste Disposal Program by $10,038,000 offset by a $10,038,000 reduction in funds from the USDA Office of the Chief Information Officer (OCIO).
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part B of House Report 111-191 to transfer $10,038,000 in the bill from the USDA Office of the Chief Information Officer (OCIO) to the Rural Utilities Service Rural Water and Waste Disposal Program (restoring the latter to FY09 appropriation levels).
